title: Pimm's Cup Cocktail
full_text:
Pimm's Cup Cocktail
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
small
cucumber
, sliced thin
8
strawberries
, sliced thin
1/2
orange
, sliced thin
1/2
lemon
, sliced thin
1/2
green apple
, sliced thin
1
quart
ice
1
cup
(
8
ounces
)
Pimm's No. 1 Cup
3
cups
(
24
ounces
)
Sprite
, 7-Up, or other clear citrus soda
Mint sprigs
to garnish
Directions
Layer fruit slices and ice in a pitcher. Add Pimm's and soda. Stir gently with a wooden spoon to combine. Pour into glasses, making sure to get fruit and ice in each glass. Garnish with mint, and serve.
Notes
Feel free to change fruit and vegetable garnishes as desired. If you like your drink a little stronger, add an extra splash of gin.
